Detailed Description

This class represents a style element.

This is the base class for style elements. There are two elements that inherits from this class: StyleSymbol and StyleShape.

A style element has a QSvgRenderer that can be used to paint the element on a QPaintDevice. The setColors method can be used to change the colors of the renderer.

Style items are loaded from elements of the Style file. The XML elements are structured as follow: 

 <element>
    <name>name</name>
    <svg>svg</svg>
 <element>
element is the super element that inherit from StyleItem. It is either a shape or a symbol. name is the name of the item. svg is the optional svg description of the item.
See also:
StyleShape

StyleSymbol

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum StyleItem::style_colours

Defines the style elements with user definable color.

Enumerator:
STYLE_KEY_COLOR  color of the background of the key
STYLE_OUTLINE_COLOR  color of the outline of the key
STYLE_ACTIVATED_COLOR  color of the background of the key when activated
STYLE_LATCHED_COLOR  color of the background of the key when latched
STYLE_TEXT_COLOR  color of the symbol displayed on the key
STYLE_TEXT_OUTLINE_COLOR  color of the outline of the symbol displayed on the key
STYLE_MOUSE_OVER_COLOR  color of the background of the key when focused
STYLE_NUM_COLOURS  number of color elements

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

StyleItem::StyleItem ( QDomElement  el,
QString  colors[],
QDomElement  defs 
)

Constructor.

Instantiates a StyleItem object. A StyleItem contains a QSvgRenderer that is instantiated from the svg element of the XML style file. The DOM element must contain a name element and may contain a svg element. The SVG is rendered using a css that defines the color of each element. The SVG can use the elements defined in the global defs element.

Parameters:
el This is the DOM element that comes from the style file.
colors This is an array of colors that are used in the css of the renderer.
See also:
style_colours
Parameters:
defs This is the DOM element of the global defs for the style.

The name of the item.

A SVG renderer that can be used to draw the item on a QPaintDevice.

The SVG description of the item.

StyleItem::setColors ( QString  colors[],
enum style_colours  key_color 
)

sets the colors of the item.

Changes the colors used in the css to render the svg.

Parameters:
colors This is an array of colors that are used in the css of the renderer.
key_color Either STYLE_KEY_COLOR, STYLE_LATCHED_COLOR, STYLE_ACTIVATED_COLOR or STYLE_MOUSE_OVER_COLOR. Defines the color to use in the background of the key. Not used for StyleSymbol objects.

Reimplemented in StyleShape.
